sourcesContent:
<template>
  <QrcodeDropZone
    class="scanner"
    @decode="$emit('decode', $event)"
  >
    <QrcodeStream
      @init="$emit('init', $event)"
      @decode="$emit('decode', $event)"
    />
  </QrcodeDropZone>
</template>

<script>
import { QrcodeStream, QrcodeDropZone } from 'vue-qrcode-reader'
export default {
  name: 'QRStream',
  components: { QrcodeStream, QrcodeDropZone }
}
</script>

<style lang="scss">
.scanner {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;

  &.slide-enter-active,
  &.slide-leave-active {
    transition: transform .5s;
  }
  &.slide-enter,
  &.slide-leave-to {
    transform: translate3d(0,100%,0);
  }
}

.qrcode-stream {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;

  &__inner-wrapper,
  &__camera {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }
}
</style>
